text:
To repeat: the problem isn't Safari, it's iOS and App Store policies that have cut off real browser competition at the knees.

No iOS user is ever allowed better than the lowest-common-denominator web, and that's *terrible* for developers and users alike. https://t.co/IDYTrfSuZ4

quoted_tweet.text: It can't be said often enough that Apple's vexatious App Store policies wouldn't be a crisis for either developers _or_ for Apple if they made or allowed a modern browser for iOS.
